sources.title: Cry Panic (1974)
sources.description: A man accidentally runs over and kills a pedestrian outside a small town. He begins to suspect that the locals, including the sheriff, are keeping secrets about the victim. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/cry-panic-1974/
